info.author: Nathanael Schaeffer
info.description:
SHTns is a high performance library for Spherical Harmonic Transform written in C, aimed at numerical simulation (fluid flows, mhd, ...) in spherical geometries.
It also provides an object oriented Python interface.
info.name: SHTns
info.platform: tested on linux, should also work on MacOSX and other *nix OS
info.html_description: SHTns is a high performance library for Spherical Harmonic Transform written in C, aimed at numerical simulation (fluid flows, mhd, …) in spherical geometries. It also provides an object oriented Python interface.
